flora.headline: Flora Annual Fall Festival Dates Announced
flora.summary: The town council has confirmed the dates for this year's festival, featuring new local vendors.

louisville.headline: Louisville High School Basketball Update
louisville.summary: The varsity team secures a home-court victory in the regional qualifiers.

clay_city.headline: New Infrastructure Project on Main St
clay_city.summary: Construction begins next week to improve water drainage and sidewalk safety.

xenia.headline: Xenia Community Center Reopening
xenia.summary: After renovations, the community center is now open for public bookings and youth sports.

sailor_springs.headline: Sailor Springs Historical Society Meeting
sailor_springs.summary: Join us this Friday to discuss the preservation of local landmarks.
